metadata.Title: CVE-2020-27560 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - negligible.
metadata.Description:
ImageMagick 7.0.10-34 allows Division by Zero in OptimizeLayerFrames in MagickCore/layer.c, which may cause a denial of service.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-27560` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

imagemagick - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.9
imagemagick-6-common - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.9
imagemagick-6.q16 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.9
imagemagick-6.q16hdri - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.9
imagemagick-common - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.9
libimage-magick-perl - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.9
libimage-magick-q16-perl - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.9
libimage-magick-q16hdri-perl - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.9
libmagick++-6-headers - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.9
libmagick++-6.q16-7 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.9
libmagick++-6.q16hdri-7 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.9
libmagickcore-6-arch-config - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.9
libmagickcore-6-headers - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.9
libmagickcore-6.q16-3 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.9
libmagickcore-6.q16-3-extra - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.9
libmagickcore-6.q16hdri-3 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.9
libmagickcore-6.q16hdri-3-extra - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.9
libmagickwand-6-headers - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.9
libmagickwand-6.q16-3 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.9
libmagickwand-6.q16hdri-3 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.9
perlmagick - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.9
No subscription required

criterions.comment: imagemagick package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.9').
